TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Sadu, title = Sadu, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sadu} }

S.FORM: = Sadu = Gaga mniq Nantowseyn Jnaysyang ka alang sadu. 101 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 366 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 95% niqan 348 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 5% niqan 18 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Seejiq/Seediq/Seejiq/Seejiq/Sediq82%, Tayal10%, Bunun3%. Hangan alang Alang Sadu Tu-ku-bey-cu na alang Alang Sadu pa wa mniq Dwiyaq Kiray hwinuk dwiyaq tupryaxanhidaw, kiya ka qnlhangan Taiwan saya mntna Cyen-su-syang alang Cinsbu sunca ddha knbaraw bay nniqan alang. Nniqan niya Nan-to-keyng Jin-ay-go Truku cwen. Knlbangan Hay-pa 1,800 meyta. Nniqan lnglingay Quri ppanan rulu Mriq rulu niya— Kwo-taw 1 Cong-san-kaw, uxay daw Kwo-taw 3 Fomosa kaw-su-kong-ru→ Kwo-taw 6 Swey-sa-ryeyn kaw-su-kong-ru→Hori, muru elu Tay 14 seyng (Pu-U kong-ru) mquri paran mmusa dhuq alang Bwarung, lmutuc elu uusa alang Truku To 85 seyng, muru mkngahu Yayung Tudu hmrin Cing-ing-cwen ya bay 12 km daw kiya ka dhuq Truku cwen da. Tapa rulu niya: Kndadax tudaya mi tuhunac mpriwaw na pa tapa rulu dhuq ppanan rulu Taycyu Kan-cng, uxay daw msdurux tapa rulu dhuq Nan-to Hori u malu uri, kiya mi tapa rulu dhuq Hori daw tapa rulu snpeyyah Hori-Truku seyng na Nan-to k-yun, mrbu 6:30 snpeyyah alang tapa rulu dhuq Hori, babaw cka hidaw 15:30 ka kndadax Hori mbrunah musa alang Truku, mntxal ka kingal diyax ppanan rulu, diyax ppanan rulu u ya bay 2 jikang. Ppwaluk tyeyn-cu patas qtan alang Teyn-cu patas pkla nniqan alang. Klwanan sediq tnualang Sejiq Truku. Sduwi na kari saya Skari kari Sejiq Truku. Snlhayan snhiyan Kiristo kyo: Cyoro Kyokay, Teynskyo (Wana bay kingal mslutuc da). Pnyahan alang Pusu pnyahan sediq alang Truku pa snpeyyah "Alang Brayaw" mi "Alang Truwan cbiyaw", kiya mi thdil dhuq "Alang Busi"mi "Alang Sadu"mi "Alang Truwan"saya. Tnualang saya u psnakan tudaya, tukcka mi tuhunac tuturu nniqan, sediq alangtudaya pa; kiya ka"Alang Brayaw"mi "Alang Busi"u babaw ndan Mccbu Kmciyuk Tanah Tunux daw ta bay wada thdil alang Bwarung da. Qntan patas Jin-ay go-ko-syo wang-can:仁愛鄉公所網站: nyahan pnatas

= Sado = Gaga mniq Nantowseyn Jnaysyang ka alang sado. 101 sapah ka kneego na sapah, 366 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnposo seejiq o mangal 95% niqan 348 hiyi sp, rahoq na oxay tnposo seejiq o mangal 5% niqan 18 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Seejiq/Seediq/Seejiq/Seejiq/Sediq82%, Tayal10%, Bonon3%. Hangan alang Alang Sado To-ko-bey-co na alang Alang Sado pa wa mniq Dwiyaq Kiray hwinok dwiyaq topryaxanhidaw, kiya ka qnlhangan Taiwan saya mntna Cyen-so-syang alang Cinsbo sonca ddha knbaraw bay nniqan alang. Nniqan niya Nan-to-keyng Jin-ay-go Troko cwen. Knlbangan Hay-pa 1,800 meyta. Nniqan lnglingay Qori ppanan rolo Mriq rolo niya— Kwo-taw 1 Cong-san-kaw, oxay daw Kwo-taw 3 Fomosa kaw-so-kong-ro→ Kwo-taw 6 Swey-sa-ryeyn kaw-so-kong-ro→Hori, moro elo Tay 14 seyng (Po-U kong-ro) mqori paran mmosa dhoq alang Bwarong, lmotoc elo oosa alang Troko To 85 seyng, moro mkngaho Yayong Todo hmrin Cing-ing-cwen ya bay 12 km daw kiya ka dhoq Troko cwen da. Tapa rolo niya: Kndadax todaya mi tohonac mpriwaw na pa tapa rolo dhoq ppanan rolo Taycyo Kan-cng, oxay daw msdorox tapa rolo dhoq Nan-to Hori o malo ori, kiya mi tapa rolo dhoq Hori daw tapa rolo snpeyyah Hori-Troko seyng na Nan-to k-yon, mrbo 6:30 snpeyyah alang tapa rolo dhoq Hori, babaw cka hidaw 15:30 ka kndadax Hori mbronah mosa alang Troko, mntxal ka kingal diyax ppanan rolo, diyax ppanan rolo o ya bay 2 jikang. Ppwalok tyeyn-co patas qtan alang Teyn-co patas pkla nniqan alang. Klwanan sediq tnoalang Sejiq Troko. Sdowi na kari saya Skari kari Sejiq Troko. Snlhayan snhiyan Kiristo kyo: Cyoro Kyokay, Teynskyo (Wana bay kingal mslotoc da). Pnyahan alang Poso pnyahan sediq alang Troko pa snpeyyah "Alang Brayaw" mi "Alang Trowan cbiyaw", kiya mi thdil dhoq "Alang Bosi"mi "Alang Sado"mi "Alang Trowan"saya. Tnoalang saya o psnakan todaya, tokcka mi tohonac totoro nniqan, sediq alangtodaya pa; kiya ka"Alang Brayaw"mi "Alang Bosi"o babaw ndan Mccbo Kmciyok Tanah Tonox daw ta bay wada thdil alang Bwarong da. Qntan patas Jin-ay go-ko-syo wang-can:仁愛鄉公所網站: nyahan pnatas
